QuestData.Title: The Storm Awakens
QuestData.Description:
I must watch over Samuel for now. I fear for the darkness assaulting his mind.
The fallen men and women around us were defectors from the house. There will be more like them within Sagehold.
Find them, and tell them 'the storm awakens'. Knowledge of our cause has spread; we need to bring all we can to our side.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Taelia at the Wavespeaker's Sanctum in Sagehold.
QuestData.RewardText: I saw some of the defectors leaving. I'm glad we got to them before Lord Stormsong did.
